rules_text:
Aurora [i](At your end step, this may exile a noncreature from your graveyard into your aurora. Each grants up to one of its colors.)[/i]
When this enchantment enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice this: Create a tapped 0/0 green Plant creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of colors in your aurora.
